q_conradapiary.Complete: So this is awkward. I read the order wrong.. they didn't want an Apiary they just wanted the frame built for it.I've only got part of the payment, but you can have these 5 Honeycombs back.Maybe you can build your own apiary now?
q_conradapiary1.Title: Bee Bulk
q_conradapiary1.Text: Thanks, the bee keepers on the mainland said they need quite a bit of time to get lots of honey.For now could you do a huge bulk order of honey? They need 100 Honey.
q_conradapiary1.Complete: Wow you got 100 Honey all together! That must have been one sticky hunt.Anyways here is your payment, 3,500 coin! That's 1,000 more than you would have made selling it in your shop!
q_mooneyheverli.Title: Hot Hot Tub
q_mooneyheverli.Text: I heard from Roman that you can make a Wooden Hot Tub, I've got some coin for your next crafted one.
q_mooneyheverli.Complete: This is pur-fect! I can't wait to use it! Oh right, here's your coin. 1350 should cover it.
q_mooneyheverli1.Title: Heavenly Hot Tub
q_mooneyheverli1.Text: What was that? That wasn't the heavenly hot tub I heard about. It didn't even have any towels!It simply isn't right, I'd like one Heverli Hot Tub. It looks heavenly.
q_mooneyheverli1.Complete: Thank you, it's the small details that make something great. Here's another 1350 coin.
q_mooneyheverli2.Title: More Heverli
q_mooneyheverli2.Text: The colours on the heverli items is fantastic, I must have more. The Heverli Canopy would be a great addition to my home.
q_mooneyheverli2.Complete: You can make the canopy! I knew it, here's your coin.
q_mooneyheverli3.Title: Luxury Home
q_mooneyheverli3.Text: The rest of the house simply does not match, now I need 4 Heverli Chairs and a Marble Table.
q_mooneyheverli3.Complete: The elegance, the comfort! Who knew you could make such luxury.It's quite a bit of coin, don't loose it in the sand.
q_mooneyheverli4.Title: Roman Said...
q_mooneyheverli4.Text: I was talking to Roman and they told me about the Heverli Sofa and how it's just a must in any home.I can't believe you didn't tell me about it! I must have two.
q_mooneyheverli4.Complete: They are nice, a bit larger than I thought. Wonder where I'll put these...... maybe the entrance by that window...... or maybe in the back..... What? You're still here? Oh yes, your coin. Here you go.
q_mooneyheverli5.Title: Plants Galore
q_mooneyheverli5.Text: Have you seen Elizabeth's home? No? Well inside there are plants everywhere and it smells so good!I need a place to put them though, maybe on some Wooden End Tables from the Heverli Workbench. Yes, 4 of those.
q_mooneyheverli5.Complete: These will make great stands for plants, here's your coin.
q_jennaferret.Title: Ferret Friend
q_jennaferret.Text: Have you seen those cute ferrets running around the ruins? They're just adorable!I heard that you could make a Ferret Habitat and I'd just be so grateful to have one!
q_jennaferret.Complete: Thank you so so much! Now to try and tame a ferret! I heard they like soft things like wool.
q_jennaferret1.Title: Weasel the Ferret
q_jennaferret1.Text: Thanks to you I was able to tame a ferret! They're just so cute! I named mine Weasel.Anyways, I was thinking of making Weasel my Ferret a nice bed, could you bring me 20 Wool?
q_jennaferret1.Complete: Oh you're here! Thank gosh! I was playing with Weasel and they bit me!I mean it didn't hurt, but I don't think I can raise this one by myself.I was talking to Charlie and they said they love animals, could you see if they an adopt Weasel from me?
q_jennaferret2.Title: Charlie and Jenna
q_jennaferret2.Text: Jenna got a Ferret? That's so sweet.Oh, she named it Weasel? But.. does she know.. ok anyways..Me? Well I guess I could take care of them, I have always wanted a furry friend. Sure! You can tell Jenna I'll pick them up after my shift.
q_jennaferret2.Complete: Really? Charlie can take care of Weasel? That's great!Charlie is so sweet! I'll wait for Charlie to come by tonight, thanks again for helping here's something for you.
q_jennaferret3.Title: Weasley not Weasel
q_jennaferret3.Text: Oh thanks for checking in. Weasel is doing great, I've been calling him Weasley though.I don't think Jenna has noticed, we go for walks with Weasley at night. She seems to like walking him.I gotta say, Weasley does poop a lot though. If you had some time could you make me a Compost Bin it should help with the smell.
q_jennaferret3.Complete: Thanks, this should help with the smell. I'll be able to get rid of the poop no problem.
q_elizabethnopick.Title: No Touching
q_elizabethnopick.Text: I noticed your no pick signs and I love them. I've noticed some of my flowers have gone missing recently.I'm not saying anyone picked them, it could have been the wind.I'd like some signs anyways though. Could you make me 2 No Pick Zone signs?
q_elizabethnopick.Complete: Thanks! I'll get these setup tonight. Here's your payment.
q_elizabethnopick1.Title: Picked Signs
q_elizabethnopick1.Text: I set up the signs a few days ago and can you believe they're gone!I don't know who would take them but I need a couple more. Can I get 2 No Pick Zone signs?
q_elizabethnopick1.Complete: Thanks! I'm setting these up tonight!
q_elizabethnopick2.Title: Just Some Weeds
q_elizabethnopick2.Text: A little awkward. I feel so bad for accusing someone of taking my signs.I was placing the new ones last night and I saw the old ones under some weeds. They're just so small I didn't notice.I'm kind of ashamed, could you tell the Mayor for me that nothing is wrong?
q_elizabethnopick2.Complete: Oh Liz. I suspected as much, that's alright though. I'll talk to her tonight and let her know it's ok. People make mistakes.
q_elizabethnopick3.Title: Huge Garden
q_elizabethnopick3.Text: I saw Elizabeth's signs and think that's a great idea! I've got a pretty big garden, do you think you could make me 5 No Pick Signs?
q_elizabethnopick3.Complete: I won't need to be hiding my flowers away now, so here's a little present! Thanks!
q_elizabethnopick4.Title: Fav Flower
q_elizabethnopick4.Text: Now that I've got these no pick signs, I'd love to plant some more flowers.I'm not sure what I'll like more, could you bring me 10 Blue Hydrangea Seeds and 10 Purple Cosmos Seeds?
q_elizabethnopick4.Complete: Thanks! Here's a bonus Seed Mystery Box! You can get them from harvesting Super Crops!
q_elizabethnopick5.Title: Forgetful Sammy
q_elizabethnopick5.Text: I heard Sierra had to get some seeds from you. I completely forgot about their order!Thank you for helping, I wish I could stock more seeds. Do you think you could make me 2 Seed Storage Crates?
q_elizabethnopick5.Complete: Thanks! Hopefully I won't forget about another order now.I almost forgot, here's your 700 coin for the order and a couple Seed Mystery Boxes I found!
q_elizabethnopick6.Title: Write It Down
q_elizabethnopick6.Text: I'm so silly! I talked to Abby and they write down every order they get on paper!Could you bring me 30 Paper? I'm going to start writing everything down, everything!
q_elizabethnopick6.Complete: Thank you so much! I don't have any coin for you but here is some fertilizer, I don't need it.
q_mnewbed1.Title: A New Bed
q_mnewbed1.Text: I'm glad you're here! I need...What? Poop? No, why would you think I need poop?I need a new bed! My bed is so uncomfortable I can't get a good night of sleep!Can you please bring me a new Light Wood Single Bed?
q_mnewbed1.Complete: Doesn't look great but I guess that will do...Thanks, hopefully I'll get a better sleep tonight.
q_mnewbed2.Title: Not Big Enough
q_mnewbed2.Text: How did I sleep?Terrible! That bed was so small I kept falling off of it!Can you get me a Light Wood Double Bed?
q_mnewbed2.Complete: Ok, definitely bigger. Still not great looking...Alright, maybe this will do, here's some coin for your trouble.
q_mnewbed3.Title: Too Big
q_mnewbed3.Text: Another terrible night of sleep...That bed you brought me was way too big, can barely even fit in my room!I've heard you got some new blueprints for new fancy furniture... Can you bring me a Crystal Garden Bed?
q_mnewbed3.Complete: Oh yeah, that's definitely more up my alley!Thank you! Hopefully this time I can catch some proper sleep!
q_mnewbed4.Title: Not Soft Enough
q_mnewbed4.Text: No, no, no! This won't do!The bed looks great and fits well, but it's so hard!I need 5 Delicate Fur and 5 Alpaca Fiber! That should soften it up!
q_mnewbed4.Complete: Oh these are soft!I believe there's some hope for this bed after all!
q_mnewbed5.Title: Pillower Pillows
q_mnewbed5.Text: My sleep? It wasn't entirely bad...Those pillows are too flimsy, I need some more filling for them.Can you please bring me 5 feathers and 5 duck feathers?
q_mnewbed5.Complete: Those should do nicely!Tonight I'll have some soft pillows to put me to sleep!
q_mnewbed6.Title: Needs to be Softer!
q_mnewbed6.Text: I'd say my sleep was adequate. Adequate however won't cut it for me!The bed could be softer... and warmer... Can you bring me 10 Wool?
q_mnewbed6.Complete: So fluffy and warm! Those should help.Here's some coin for your help... don't spend it all in one place!
q_mnewbed7.Title: The Wrong Feathers
q_mnewbed7.Text: I thought I had the best pillows after you brought me those feathers...But I just heard that the best feathers for pillows are Mallard Feathers!Can you bring me 10 Mallard Feathers to replace those horrible feathers you brought me?
q_mnewbed7.Complete: Great! I can't have a subpar pillow! What would people say?You should have bought the right feathers the first time... But here's some coin anyways!
q_mnewbed8.Title: Something Smelly
q_mnewbed8.Text: I've had a couple good nights of sleep with the new pillows...But something doesn't smell right in the house.I heard Lavender are great smelling flowers to freshen up a house, can you bring me 10 of those?
q_mnewbed8.Complete: These smell great!Thank you for all your help, now I should be able to get a good night of sleep!
q_seedmaker.Title: Broken Seedmaker
q_seedmaker.Text: I just have the worst luck my seedmaker broke, and I gave you my only blueprint. Could you make me one?
q_seedmaker.Complete: Thanks! You're the best! I've got this crystal planter but have no use for it, you can have it.
q_seedstationelizabeth.Title: Seed Bundler
q_seedstationelizabeth.Text: I heard that Sammy gave you their blueprint for a Seed Bundle Station!I've been wanting one ever since I heard about it. I'm not great at building though and could never get it to work.If you could craft me one I can give you these spare seeds I have.
q_seedstationelizabeth.Complete: Thanks so much! The seed bundler is great isn't it?I love how the super crops look compared to a single seed being planted. Here are some seeds for all your hard work.
q_seedstationelizabeth2.Title: Butterfly Garden
q_seedstationelizabeth2.Text: How is your gardening going? Have you had a chance to use the seeds I gave you?I need to ask for your help, I've got a huge order and I just don't have enough inventory.I'm short 30 Strawberries. If you can bring them to me I've got some coin for you.
q_seedstationelizabeth2.Complete: Wow they look great! I hope they weren't too much trouble, here's your coin.Did you find any Seed Mystery Boxes when you were harvesting your super crops?I've got a spare one if you'd like it, you can even purchase a blueprint from Roman to turn it into a Butterfly Garden.
q_seedstationelizabeth3.Title: A New Garden
q_seedstationelizabeth3.Text: The butterfly gardens are not only pretty but very useful. When you have some butterflies inside they may leave seeds for you.I'd love to have my very own Butterfly Garden if you can make me one.
q_seedstationelizabeth3.Complete: Thanks! I can't wait to catch some butterflies and give them this beautiful new home.For now I'll use it as decoration. Here's some coin for your help and some glass bottles so you can catch your own butterflies.
q_wand.Title: Guildmaster
q_wand.Text: I see you're new to Florens. Welcome lad.It's not all flowers and poop I'm afraid. There are dangers that lurk in the cave I am guarding.Don't worry though, I've been keeping the monsters at bay. If you don't want to battle them you don't have to.
q_wand.Complete: If you wish to dive into the Dungeons you'll have to prove you're ready. There is good loot to find in there, that I'm sure you'll be able to sell in your shop. But, it is dangerous.If you think you have what it takes I can teach you. Sleep on it and come see me tomorrow if you wish to enter.
q_wand1.Title: Your First Wand
q_wand1.Text: You want to enter the dungeons huh? Well you're the first in a long time, even Charlie doesn't want to go inside.Alright lad, you're going to have to prove your ready. Here's a basic wand, get familiar with it.
q_wand1.Complete: It's not strong enough to damage anything but bubbles and hopefully the creatures in the dungeon.Here's the blueprint for the wand if you break this one. You can craft it in your crafting menu.
q_wand2.Title: Training Dummies
q_wand2.Text: I can't let you in the dungeon yet, it's not safe!You should first get acquainted with your wand. I can set up some training dummies for you if you can bring me some materials.I just need 5 Wooden Boards.
q_wand2.Complete: Alright, that's all I need! I'll set up the dummies downstairs, try shooting them!Here's a blueprint for training dummies if you want to build your own training grounds.It's getting late out there, we'll chat more tomorrow.
q_wand3.Title: Popping Challenge
q_wand3.Text: You think you're ready to go to the dungeon? Ha! Hitting dummies is easy!To go into the dungeon you need to be used to hitting moving targets!Bubbles can pop out of the water near concentrations of seaweed.I want you to use your wand to pop one of those bubbles and bring me a Blue Mystery Box that's inside it.
q_wand3.Complete: Ah, so you managed to pop a bubble, it seems you're not that helpless after all.Here's a lavender for your trouble, and I don't need this box. Get popping those bubbles and prepare for the dungeon. See you tomorrow.
q_wand4.Title: Enter the Dungeon
q_wand4.Text: Alright, You're very persistant. I guess you can go into the dungeons.If you pass out, I'll know it and drag you out, hopefully, before anything gets you.Select your wand and get close to the dungeon's door to go in.Explore the dungeon and report back to me with your findings.
q_wand4.Complete: Aye, you're back!Maybe you're not that clueless after all... So what do you have to report?
q_dungeonshards.Title: Dungeon Shards
q_dungeonshards.Text: You found Dungeon Shards from the monsters?The Adventurer's Guild would like to buy all the dungeon shards you find.
q_dungeonshards.Complete: By studying the dungeon shards maybe we can learn more about how those monsters are being animated.I have a crate of dungeon shards and coins in the back, you can trade your dungeon shards for coins there.
q_summerfestival.Title: Summer is Here!
q_summerfestival.Text: Welcome to the Summer Festival! We have fun minigames to try and items to win!
q_summerfestival.Complete: I hope you enjoy it!And try not to spend all your money in one day! Hahaha
q_summergames.Title: Play Some Games!
q_summergames.Text: Try playing each of the mini-games and come back to tell me what you think!
q_summergames.Complete: Those games are fun huh?Try not to spend all your coin though!
q_albertoend.Title: The Know Me!
q_albertoend.Text: Did you hear?No? How could you not hear? It was in all the big newspapers!I'm the talk of the town! What do you mean for what? The glider!
q_albertoend.Complete: Everyone loves it and I couldn't have done it without you.Before you set up my shop all I was, was the silly bunny trying fly.
q_albertoend1.Title: Jumping
q_albertoend1.Text: Thanks to you I've been recognized as the sole glider inventor.I'd like you to give this to Frank as I couldn't have done this without them as well.
q_albertoend1.Complete: What for me? I'm not sure I'll be jumping off any roofs anytime soon. You can tell Alberto thanks, I guess.
q_albertoend2.Title: Grounded
q_albertoend2.Text: What they didn't like it? I thought everyone wanted to fly. I guess Frank is a bit more grounded than I thought.Hrm what could I get Frank? Who knows them best? Oh the Mayor probably does! Can you ask the Mayor what Franks favourite thing is?
q_albertoend2.Complete: Oh Frank, I don't think they like anything in particular. I know they like vacation days.How about taking some of their workload off them? Try talking to Frank and see if you can help.
q_albertoend3.Title: Vacation
q_albertoend3.Text: Vacation you say? I haven't taken a vacation for as long as I can remember!If you're interested in helping me out I have been wanting to expand my forge. I still need 4 Furnaces though.
q_albertoend3.Complete: Wow, Thanks! I know this was all Alberto but here's a little bit of coin.Thanks again for your help, with these I'll be able to take a few days off. I think I'll just catch up on some sleep.
q_albertoend4.Title: New Glider
q_albertoend4.Text: I heard you helped Frank and gave them a few days off, they definitely deserve it.You've been doing so much to help everyone else, maybe I can do something to help you.I've been talking to Malu and we both think your glider is a bit outdated. Stop by and see them when you have some time.
q_albertoend4.Complete: Alberto sent me this and said not to give it to you until tomorrow. I don't know why, but rules are rules.
q_albertoend5.Title: Galaxy Glider
q_albertoend5.Text: I'm not sure what happened, but my dog got into the present and ripped it up.I'm so sorry I really don't want to tell Alberto though. Can you tell them I ruined your present.
q_albertoend5.Complete: Oh no! That's terrible. No problem at all though, that was just the test glider.I'm kind of glad that Malu didn't give it to you. I'll let them know it's ok.Here's your new glider! Thanks again for all you've done. I feel so at home in Florens.
q_wanderer.Title: Silly Bunny
q_wanderer.Text: No one believed in me, I was just the silly bunny digging in the dirt.Thanks to you I've got a Museum filled with almost all my favourite things.
q_wanderer.Complete: I don't mean to be picky, I've been a bit grumpy lately as I haven't had a good bed in ages.If you're up for it I can get a list together for tomorrow.
q_wanderer1.Title: Extra Time
q_wanderer1.Text: You're back! Seeing as you have so much time on your hands, I wrote down some things I could use.It's a small list, I only need one Light Wood Double Bed and 20 Delicate Fur for some pillows.
q_wanderer1.Complete: Thanks! You've always made me feel at home, even though I don't show it all the time.
q_wanderer2.Title: Heavenly Heverli
q_wanderer2.Text: The items you made are great but I don't think my home feels like a home yet.Oh you didn't know? I live above the Museum.No, you can't visit.Anyways, I saw the Heverli set and it's quite Heavenly. I could use 4 Heverli Chairs and 1 Heverli Table if you have it, if you don't you can buy the workbench from Roman.
q_wanderer2.Complete: Wow you made them already! Thanks, here's your coin.I've been thinking about putting up a sign. Could you talk to Frank and see if they can sign off on it.
q_wanderer3.Title: What's their name?
q_wanderer3.Text: Sure I can make a sign for the Wanderer.There's just one problem, and it's a little embarassing.I don't know their name. What should I put on the sign?
q_wanderer3.Complete: WHAT!? What do you mean you don't know either?I guess I'll try asking the Mayor tonight and see if they know. I mean they must know.. right?
q_wanderer4.Title: Not Nameless
q_wanderer4.Text: I talked to the Mayor last night and they don't know the Wanderer's name either.Looks like when you found them you should have asked who you were building the Museum for.I have an idea. Why don't you bring the Wanderer some paper and ask them to write down what they'd like on the sign.
q_wanderer4.Complete: What do you mean write down what I want on the sign. I already told you, I'd like my name on the sign.Oh you don't want to spell it wrong? Alright. I'll write it down tomorrow when I have some time.
q_wanderer5.Title: Scribbles
q_wanderer5.Text: Here you go, I'm not sure why you needed it written down. I guess it's better to be safe than sorry.I'm quite busy with the Museum, can you deliver this to Frank.
q_wanderer5.Complete: Thanks, I see now. This is an interesting name.I'll talk to Roman tonight and see if they can lend me what I need for tomorrow.
q_wanderer6.Title: Frankly Frank
q_wanderer6.Text: I talked to Roman and they said "I have to be Frank with you, I can't just give you my stock".Can you believe them?! Here I am a hard working bear and they don't want to lend me one Alphabet Workstation.They did mention I could buy it, but I only would need it once. Do you have one you could lend me?
q_wanderer6.Complete: Thanks! I'll get the sign done in 2 days. Here's the coin for the workbench, I might hold onto it.
q_wanderer7b.Title: New Sign
q_wanderer7b.Text: Here you go one sign for the Wanderer. They can hang it on any wall they'd like.It ws my first time using the Alphabet Workstation, it's O.K. I might hold onto it for a bit longer if you don't need it.Thanks, here's the sign for the wanderer.
q_wanderer7b.Complete: This is great! I'll get this hung up tonight. You've really made me feel at home here.Here's the coin for the sign and a little something special.
q_wanderer7b.RewardText: Blue Glow Bunny Skin and 500 pièces
q_sadieend.Title: Best Paws
q_sadieend.Text: Hey! I've been meaning to catch up with you, things have been going so good I got you a little something. Let me grab it.
q_sadieend.Complete: Found it! I've been carrying this around for awhile hoping to run into you.It's just a little something to say Thank You for how much you've helped me. Thanks to you I run my dream Inn filled with all the best paws!Here's your new Decoration Station! You can use it to make decorative cakes, I hope you like it. Thanks again!
q_sadieend1.Title: Pretty Cakes
q_sadieend1.Text: How have you liked your present? Have you tried it out yet?I know, you can't eat the cakes. But, some things are just too beautiful to eat.Truth is, I tried using it but I'm not a great baker. Think you could make me one Carrot Cake?
q_sadieend1.Complete: Wow this looks so good! I know Thorne would love one of  these!I'm definitely going to tell Thorne tonight. This is just too beautiful not to share with friends.
q_sadieend2.Title: Cake Time
q_sadieend2.Text: How have you been? I know you've probably been so busy, but I was wondering if you're interested in baking some more cakes?I told some customers about your Carrot Cake and they want to try some. If you have the time, think you'e up for making 5 Carrot Cakes?
q_sadieend2.Complete: Thanks! I'm sure everyone will love these as much as I do! I got you a bit of extra coin, how does 6500 coin sound?Say, have you tried making the other cakes at the decoration station? If you ever do, let me know.
q_sadieend3.Title: A Unicorn Cake
q_sadieend3.Text: You can make the Unicorn Cake? That's amazing it looks so hard to make!You're really talented, if you can I'd love to try one Unicorn Cake.
q_sadieend3.Complete: This looks incredible! Wow you're really talented.These cakes have really made my Inn the place to be, and it's all thanks to you!You've inspired me to try my paw at baking again. Thanks for always being so helpful. Here's your coin.
q_thorneend.Title: Sharing is Carrot
q_thorneend.Text: Sadie came over last night and shared the Carrot Cake you made. I had no idea you were such a great baker!You know I love carrots and cake.. think you could make me one too?
q_thorneend.Complete: Oh, Thank You!! This looks so good. I might have to learn how to bake, right now I'm focussed on my bunnies though.Don't worry I won't be giving any cake to the bunnies, here's some coin for your troubles.
q_thorneend1.Title: Rehoming Bunnies
q_thorneend1.Text: I'm glad I caught you, I've been meaning to say thanks. You've been a real treat to meet.Thanks to you I've found my passion is raising and rehoming the wild bunnies.
q_thorneend1.Complete: I wish I could help more though, I just don't have the habitats for them all. Winters get pretty cold around here.I couldn't ask for more from you though, but if you ever need some coin I might have some to spare for the bunnies.
q_thorneend2.Title: Too Cold
q_thorneend2.Text: Really? You're interested in helping me? Thanks!I love taking care of the wild bunnies, I even grow carrots here and in the wild for them.Sometimes in the Winter it snows so much that the bunnies can't get into their dens.I know you've done so much for me, but if you could take some time to craft 5 Bunny Habitats it would mean so much.
q_thorneend2.Complete: Thanks! Here's the coin for them. I'll get these set up tonight.Come see me tomorrow if you'd like to see them set up.
q_thorneend3.Title: Slippery Slope
q_thorneend3.Text: I've set up the Bunny Habitats, what do you think?Yeah.. there are only 4 because I tried putting it on the hill but it slid down and broke apart.I was feeling pretty bad about it, but thinking about your Carrot Cake cheered me right up.Think you could make one more for little old me?
q_thorneend3.Complete: Thanks! You've made my night!Since knowing you, you've made everything so much better. I've got my own Carrot Shop and can help all these bunnies.I was thinking, you and Conrad seem to be on great terms. I'm sad to say I never got to know Conrad too well.I'm a bit nervous to ask, but could you try talking to Conrad for me to see if they're interested in rehoming some bunnies with me?
q_thorneend4.Title: Random Gifts
q_thorneend4.Text: Oh yeah, I know Thorne. They live out near the duck pond.They want to rehome bunnies? Not sure how much help I could be but I can try talking to them tonight.
q_thorneend4.Complete: Oh that reminds me, I recently did a huge order for Clovis and they gave me one of their new wings.They aren't really my style though, I've seen you wear wings before though. If you want them you can have them.
q_thorneend5.Title: Transport Container
q_thorneend5.Text: I talked to Thorne last night and they're looking to rehome bunnies to other islands.It's a pretty great idea, we have so many here and I don't see them on other islands very much.I don't want them to hop off the boat though, will need some sort of transport container.
q_thorneend5.Complete: I'm not sure what will work either, I'll try talking to Frank tonight and see if we can build something for the bunnies.Anyways, thanks for getting Thorne to talk to me. This might be pretty profitable, here's a bit of coin for helping out.
q_thorneend6.Title: Comfy Transport
q_thorneend6.Text: I talked to Frank last night and they suggested we use flower storage crates filled with hay.If you could help me out by making them, 6 Flower Storage Crates and bringing me 20 Hay?
q_thorneend6.Complete: Thanks I'll get this set up tonight. You can tell Thorne I'll be ready to transport bunnies by tomorrow.
q_thorneend7.Title: Best Homes
q_thorneend7.Text: Wow, you've been so helpful! We are going to find the best homes for the bunnies!I found a pretty rare bunny the other day and thought you might want to give them a home.
q_thorneend7.Complete: Thanks to you I'll be rehoming bunnies to the best homes I can find.Meeting you has been the best thing to happen to me. Thank you, take care of this little one.
q_thorneend8.Title: Thanks to you!
q_thorneend8.Text: I wanted to say Thanks again, with Thorne's new bunny business I'm able to travel further and more often.I love exploring and because of you I've been able to grow my own business so much.
q_thorneend8.Complete: Sorry to be all sappy, I just wanted to say Thanks and give you this.I found it on a small island all by itself. I travel too much to take care of it, maybe you can give it a good home?
q_splashend.Title: A Rare Friend
q_splashend.Text: I heard Conrad found a Kitsune Fox for you! I've got the perfect thing to match. I'll happily give it to you if you could do one favor for me.I'd love to have a Kitsune Fox myself, but I haven't had any luck in finding one.I hear if you tame 25 foxes you will have a chance to find a Kitsune Fox in the wild. Do you think you could tame one for me?
q_splashend.Complete: Thanks! I've got a Kitsune Skin for you if you'd like to match your fox.Oh, before I forget. I heard that if you tame 5 Kitsune Foxes you'll have a chance to spot a rare legendary Kitsune Fox large enough to ride!
q_mccoyend.Title: Out of the Blue
q_mccoyend.Text: Hey friend, how have you been?I wanted to say, Thank You. This might be out of the blue for you, but I've been wanting to talk to you for awhile.I didn't know quite how to say it, but because of you I've got my dream shop. I really appreciate it. I even got you something. Let me grab it.
q_mccoyend.Complete: It's not much, but I hope you'll like it as much as I do. I'm really glad you moved to Florens.
q_mccoyend1.Title: Aquarium
q_mccoyend1.Text: You like the aquarium? It's pretty great. I don't have the blueprint for it though, Frank made it for me.You could try talking to Frank and see if they'll share it with you.
q_mccoyend1.Complete: Oh you like that? Sure I can share the blueprint. I don't have it on me though, can you come back tomorrow?
q_mccoyend2.Title: Fishy
q_mccoyend2.Text: Funny enough I never would have made this without the Wanderer.I based the design for the aquarium off a Marble Display. I can show you how if you bring me one.
q_mccoyend2.Complete: Ah thanks, it's really simple actually. You just fill up the glass area with water and drop some sand in.Here's the blueprint, you can craft it at a workbench.
q_robotquest.Title: Milking Woes
q_robotquest.Text: Milking cows is so boring... At least that is what my assistant has been telling me.I heard there's a new product in the mainland that can help with that. See if Conrad can get it for me.
q_robotquest.Complete: A product that can milk cows...I'll ask around the mainland and see what I can find.Come back tomorrow and I'll let you know.
q_robotquest1.Title: Gold Inventions
q_robotquest1.Text: I've met an inventor in the mainland that says they can help but they don't trust their work with someone they don't know.They want a good faith offer of 20 gold to get started.
q_robotquest1.Complete: Great, I'll take it to them.Come back tomorrow and I'll update you on their progress.
q_robotquest2.Title: Run Moo Tests
q_robotquest2.Text: Their invention is up and running and it can collect plenty of things but they're not sure if it can milk a cow without scaring it.Can you give me a cow so they can test their invention with it?
q_robotquest3.Title: How Heavy Can a Cow Be?
q_robotquest3.Text: I'm not sure if my boat can support the cow...I think we should test it first.Can you bring me 40 stone blocks?
q_robotquest3.Complete: Great, I'll test it out later, come back tomorrow.
q_robotquest4.Title: No Moo Boat
q_robotquest4.Text: My boat... It sank...I need a new boat.Can you see if Frank knows anything about boat making?
q_robotquest4.Complete: Conrad needs a new boat?I've never made a boat... But it's pretty much like a house upside down right?Let me think about it and come back tomorrow.
q_robotquest5.Title: Upside Down House
q_robotquest5.Text: I thought about it and I think I can throw something together but I'll need a special wood to make sure it can float.Can you talk to Bruce and see if they have something for us?
q_robotquest5.Complete: Wood good for a boat? Let me think about it...
q_robotquest6.Title: Floaty Wood
q_robotquest6.Text: I think I know the right tree for your boat but we don't have it in stock...If you can give us ten thousand coin we can place an order with our team and deliver it to Frank in 2 days.
q_robotquest6.Complete: Great! Will place the order tonight!Frank should receive the wood in 2 days.
q_robotquest7.Title: Boat Benches
q_robotquest7.Text: Yeah I received the wood, will get started on this upside-down house right away!I mean boat... yeah... boat... right... I guess I'll need some seats for this "boat".Can you bring me 2 wooden benches?
q_robotquest7.Complete: Great, I'll have the upside-down house in Conrad's dock tomorrow.
q_robotquest8.Title: New Boat
q_robotquest8.Text: The new boat looks great! Frank did a good job.
q_robotquest8.Complete: I'll take the cow to the mainland tonight.Come back tomorrow and I'll let you know how it went.
q_robotquest9.Title: Moo Robot
q_robotquest9.Text: The test went great and they sent their invention with me!
q_robotquest9.Complete: We had a great time on the way back, it's a very happy invention.
q_robotquest10.Title: Robot heureux
q_robotquest10.Text: Did they have something to milk my cows?
q_robotquest10.Complete: It looks great! My cows are going to love it!Thanks, here's something for your troubles.
q_robotquest11.Title: Robot Sales
q_robotquest11.Text: You know what, I think more people would like to have those robots as well.Do you think conrad could bring me more so I can sell it?
q_robotquest11.Complete: I'll talk to the inventor, would be great to set up another recurring gig.Thanks for including me in this!
q_present1.Title: Start of Winter
q_present1.Text: It's that time of year again! The snow is falling, the birds are chipping and there's a crisp joy in the air!To celebrate this chilly time I have a present for every member of our little town, Florens.Here's your gift, even I don't know what's inside! Come back on the last day of Winter to get another one!
q_present30.Title: Fin de l'hiver
q_present30.Text: Seasons greetings my pawsome pal! I hope this Winter was as chilly and wonderful for you, as it was for me.To celebrate going into the new year I've got a present just for you! See you next year!
q_penguinseasonal.Title: Manchot rose
q_penguinseasonal.Text: Have you seen those cute penguins on the island to the North? They seem to really like Small Fish.I'd love a penguin friend this winter, if you can tame the Pink Penguin before Winter is over I'd be so happy with one.
q_penguinseasonal.Complete: Thanks! This penguin is even cuter up close! I'll bring it to Flo to name right away!Flo found this incredible plant recently, if you place it it'll even dance!
q_foxseasonal.Title: Renard d'hiver
q_foxseasonal.Text: Have you seen all the foxes running around?I'd love to have a foxy friend, if you find a tamed one can you bring it by before Spring comes? I've got a honeycomb I can trade for it.
q_foxseasonal.Complete: Thanks so much! I'll take great care of this furry fox. Have you seen the white fox in the Winter? I hope to see it one day.
q_coalseasonal.Title: Warm Winter
q_coalseasonal.Text: Hi there, great to run into you. I've been asking everyone but no one, not even John Stone has any coal to spare!This winter has been so cold and I hear you have coal to spare. Think you can bring an old friend 20 Coal this Winter.
q_coalseasonal.Complete: Why thanks, you're a great friend. Here's a little something to celebrate this Winter season.
q_abbyseasonalpie.Title: Winter Pies
q_abbyseasonalpie.Text: It's snowing! Don't you just love it?Every Winter I make Pumpkin Pies, their the best you can make. I am so sad this year though, I can't make any.Why? I don't have any Pumpkins! I forgot to plant my Pumpkin Seeds!Say.. if you have some Pumpkins I can definitely make it worth your while. Can you bring them to me this Winter.
q_abbyseasonalpie.Complete: Thanks so much! I'll turn these into some delicious Pumpkin Pies in no time! Here's some coin for the pumpkins and I'll send you a fresh pie soon in the mail!
q_doughseasonal.Title: Honey for Dough
q_doughseasonal.Text: Hey baker, how has your oven been treating you? Say, do you have any honey you could spare?If you could bring me 25 honey before Winter is over, I've got some dough I can trade.
q_doughseasonal.Complete: Thanks so much! Here's 10 Dough! Come see me in a couple days if you have some more Honey to trade.
q_doughseasonal2.Title: Double the Dough
q_doughseasonal2.Text: Hey you came back! If you're interested in doing another trade I've got some Dough for you.If you can bring me 50 Honey before Winter is done I'll have 20 Dough ready for you.
q_doughseasonal2.Complete: Wow this is great! Here's your Dough, don't worry it's fresh. Thanks!
q_coalseasonal2.Title: Warmer Winter
q_coalseasonal2.Text: Well you won't believe this, but I ran out of coal!I know, I know. But, if you happen to have 30 more to spare that should last me until Winter is done.I'll make sure to make it worth your while. Thanks neighbour.
q_coalseasonal2.Complete: Thanks a heap! Here's a gift box I won at the Winter festival, and a couple chicks for you to take care of.
q_elizabethwinseasonal.Title: Winter Flower Trade
q_elizabethwinseasonal.Text: Have you seen all the wonderful decorations available at the Winter Festival? They're just purr-fect.I've got a couple extra gift boxes that I'm happy to trade for some flowers if you can bring them before Spring arrives. I can always use more Pointsettas, bring me 10 and I'll give you two decoration crates and two crystal planters.
q_elizabethwinseasonal.Complete: Oh thank you they are beautiful! Oops, this one still has some dirt on it. I can clean it right up.They're just wonderful! Did you know they can live for half a year! Oh right, here's your gift boxes and crystal planters. Thanks!
q_elizabethwinseasonal.RewardText: 2 Crystal Planter, 2 Winter Small Deco Crate
q_splashseasonalwinter.Title: Winter Storage
q_splashseasonalwinter.Text: Sales have been going so well that I've been looking to add some storage. I need the items before Winter is done though. Think you can get all the items before Winter is done?Great! I need 4 Paint Storage Crates. Instead of the usual 2480 coins I'm willing to give you 5000!
q_splashseasonalwinter.Complete: Thanks! This is just in time for Spring customers! Here's your coin, don't spend it all in one place, but if you do make sure to spend it at my shop!
q_maluspringseasonal.Title: Bright Spring Dyes
q_maluspringseasonal.Text: Isn't Spring just the best season? There are flowers everywhere, and they're great for making dyes!If you're running low on dyes I can trade you for some colours I need, but it has to be before Summer comes and my next shipment arrives.If you have 5 Yellow Dye I can give you 5 Purple Dye and 5 Green Dye.
q_maluspringseasonal.Complete: Thanks! I've been using yellow so much it's such a happy bright colour. Here you go, thanks for trading with me!
q_kieranspringseasonal.Title: Weeds for Rocks
q_kieranspringseasonal.Text: Ah dang, Winter is over. Now that it's Spring I've got to clean up the campsite...That means picking all these plants! Oh hey, you like picking plants and I have some shiny rocks.If you can pick 200 Plant Fiber before Summer, I'll give you these 10 Crystal Geodes.
q_kieranspringseasonal.Complete: Ah, rad! This place is looking better. Here are those shiny rocks you wanted.
q_thornespringseasonal.Title: Springing Problem
q_thornespringseasonal.Text: Over here! Good I caught you before you hopped away!Now that Winter is over the bunnies have been eating so much! I'm almost hopping out!If you can bring me 20 carrots before Summer, I can trade you for this Bunny Easter Crate.
q_thornespringseasonal.Complete: Thank you! Here's your Bunny Easter Crate, it's not much but maybe you'll get a rare colourful bunny?
q_robertspringseasonal.Title: Wood Worries
q_robertspringseasonal.Text: Say, think you cold help an old bear out? My paws just aren't what they used to be.Now that Summer is almost here I've got to do repairs but I'm all out of wood. If you can collect 100 Wood before Summer, I've got 1000 coins for you.
q_robertspringseasonal.Complete: Thanks, this wood will be very useful to have on paw. Here's your 1000 coins, you earned it.
q_jamessummerseasonal.Title: Eggs for Milk
q_jamessummerseasonal.Text: My shipment of Milk came in but for some reason it's double what I ordered.You can use it? Well if you'd like it I can trade you for it, but it has to be during the Summer or it'll go bad.How about you give me 20 Chicken Eggs and I'll give you 10 Milk.
q_jamessummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks, I hope you put this Milk to good use.
q_franksummerseasonal.Title: Boards for Glass
q_franksummerseasonal.Text: Now that it's Summer everyone wants to build something. I have bear-ly enough wood to cover my orders.If you're interested in a trade I've got 30 Glass I can give you for 20 Wooden Boards, but I need them before Fall.
q_franksummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks! If you have more Wooden Boards I've got some more Glass I can trade in a few days.
q_franksummerseasonal2.Title: Double the Trade
q_franksummerseasonal2.Text: I'm running short on Wooden Boards, are you interested in doing another trade?Bring me 20 Wooden Boards before Summer is over and I've got 30 Glass for you.
q_franksummerseasonal2.Complete: Thanks! You've been a huge help, I could bear-ly manage without you.
q_beltransummerseasonal.Title: Great Geode Trade
q_beltransummerseasonal.Text: I've seen you in the caves collecting geodes, if you have some extras I've got some ore to trade.Bring me 20 Geodes and I'll give you 10 Silver Ore and 10 Copper Ore for them.Sure you might get gold from your geodes, but you might get stone. If you want to trade, bring me the geodes before the end of Summer.
q_beltransummerseasonal.Complete: Great choice, here's your Copper and Silver. Wish me luck, I hope I find Gold.
q_jennasummerseasonal.Title: Bunny for Lemons
q_jennasummerseasonal.Text: Looking for a little boost this Summer? I've got just the thing for you, Lemonade!No coin? Hrm... how about a trade?If you bring me, 1 White Bunny I've got 10 Lemonade for you!
q_jennasummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks this bunny is so cute! Here's your Lemonade, you can sell it or drink it for energy.
q_abbyfallseasonal.Title: Shrooms for Books
q_abbyfallseasonal.Text: Have you seen all these mushrooms popping up everywhere? I want to make a mushroom soup, but don't have enough.If you have 20 Red Mushrooms, I can give you some of my decorative books.
q_abbyfallseasonal.Complete: Thanks, here you go one decorative book pile.
q_sadiefallseasonal.Title: Fish For Food
q_sadiefallseasonal.Text: Isn't Fall just the best season? The colours are so beautiful.Winter will be here soon though and we have to prepare, if you have any Fish let me know.I need to buy all the Small Fish I can before Winter comes. If you have 15 Small Fish, I can give you this Seedmaker.
q_sadiefallseasonal.Complete: Thanks, here's the Seedmaker. When you place a flower or plant inside it'll turn it into seeds. I have no use for it.
q_sammyfallseasonal.Title: Sunflower Trade
q_sammyfallseasonal.Text: Hey friend, in Fall there are so many new plants everywhere. I want to get my paws on all of them.I am having trouble finding Sunflowers. I hear you can dry them and save their seeds for next year.Could you bring me 10 Sunflowers before Winter, and I'll give you some premium seeds.
q_sammyfallseasonal.Complete: Wow thanks! I've got something special for you! This pack is 4 seeds in 1, when you harvest it you'll even get a seed back!
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Title: Sunflower Max Trade
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Text: Interested in another trade? I could sure use some more Sunflowers if you have them.If you can bring me 20 Sunflowers before Winter arrives I can give you some more premium seeds.
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Complete: Here you go, 4 premium bundled seed packs! They're beautiful, especially in the Winter.
q_stonefallseasonal.Title: Feast for the Miners
q_stonefallseasonal.Text: Everyone has been working so hard to get the projects done before winter... I want to treat the miners to a large feast this fall!If you have 1 Pumpkin Pies and 10 Vegetable Skewers I have some coin set aside for you!
q_stonefallseasonal.Complete: Thanks! The miners will be so happy! Here's your coin!
